summary: Disney Channel is an American TV channel owned by The Walt Disney Company. It started in 1983 and was originally for families. Since 1997, it's mainly focused on kids and teens aged 6-14. It shows original shows, movies, and some other programs. In 2023, about 70 million U.S. homes can watch it, down from a peak of 100 million in 2011. Its global reach has also shrunk due to streaming services like Disney+ and competition from other platforms.
title: Disney Channel
